Name: DROP VR - AUDIO VISUALIZER
About the game: DROP VR is an innovative audio visualizer! Immerse yourself in the stage, play with objects and the environment around you, change its appearance to suit your tastes, and above it all ... enjoy this scene created in real time just for you. To play, simply play music on your computer (any source, youtube or movie etc.).
